function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased visits to green areas by households with children","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases in green areas due to higher foot traffic","Mitigation":"Encourage responsible use of green areas, implement social distancing guidelines, and provide hygiene facilities","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring green area foot traffic, mobile apps for crowd management, and contactless facilities","People":"Families with children, other visitors to green areas","Owner":"Local governments, park administrators, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Influence of household income on visits to green areas","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases in green areas due to higher foot traffic from high-income households","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health education for high-income households, promote equitable access to green areas, and ensure adherence to safety guidelines","Technologies":"Digital outreach campaigns, real-time crowd monitoring systems, and public health awareness platforms","People":"High-income households, other visitors to green areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Influence of personal attributes on visits to green areas","Impact":"Risk of overcrowding in green areas based on personal attributes like income and presence of children, leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote responsible use of green areas, develop inclusive access policies, and encourage diverse use of outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Data analytics for visitor trends, community engagement platforms, and geospatial mapping for equitable access","People":"Diverse population visiting green areas","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, and urban planners"}]}
